name: UpdateVendorCreditRefund
description:
Update a refunded vendor credit transaction.

Use this tool to update details of a refunded vendor credit transaction by specifying the vendor credit ID and refund ID.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the organization. This is needed to specify which organization the vendor credit refund update applies to.

parameters.name: vendor_credit_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the vendor credit to be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the vendor credit.

parameters.name: vendor_credit_refund_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the vendor credit refund transaction that needs to be updated.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the vendor credit refund.

parameters.name: vendor_credit_refund_details
parameters.description: JSON object with details to update the vendor credit refund. Includes date, refund mode, reference number, amount, exchange rate, account ID, and description.

date.description: The date on which the vendor credit is created. Must be in yyyy-mm-dd format. This date determines the accounting period and affects tax calculations.

reference_number.description: Optional reference number for tracking purposes. Can be any custom string or auto-generated. Useful for linking to external systems or internal tracking. Max-Length [100]

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate for converting the vendor credit currency to base currency. Required when currency differs from base currency. Retrieve rates from currency exchange rate APIs.

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the chart of accounts entry. Retrieve account IDs from the List Chart of Accounts API endpoint. Determines which account the line item affects for accounting purposes.

description.description: Detailed description of the line item. Provides additional information about the product or service being credited. Displayed on the vendor credit document.
